website_summaries.verdict: Milky sunscreen spray that’s quickly absorbed by the skin.
pros: Light-feeling lotion that leaves the skin feeling dewy
Good for sensitive skin and those who are exposed to intense sun
cons: Spray is not very fine, so needs to be rubbed in

customer_reviews.title: Not as fine of a mist as I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Not as fine of a mist as I was looking for. Product is heavy and greasy feeling and sprays splotches that have to be rubbed in anyway like a normal cream. Also can irritate eyes. Wouldn't by again and will go back to the Cosmedix brand.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Clarins  product always out performs all othersms all other dunscorms
customer_reviews.text: Have always loved clarins.. I live in sunny Arizona and need a sunscreen that protects...🌞 This product is fabulous.. Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah lalonde

customer_reviews.title: This is a great sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: This is a great sunscreen - although since it is a bit shiny best to wear at home or at beach.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Benton

customer_reviews.title: Works effective
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't make me sweat. Safe to use for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.author: Deepak.S

customer_reviews.title: Wrong item
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised to find that I had received the wrong item. They were good about taking it back, But what a pain. And no sunscreen for the hot weather this week.
customer_reviews.author: Gavin Ralbag

customer_reviews.title: The smell is really nice and maybe something I’d use at the beach
customer_reviews.text: Not what I was looking for. It’s greasy/oily. I was looking for something light without the greasy feel. The smell is really nice and maybe something I’d use at the beach. Not something I’d wearing daily
customer_reviews.author: Izzy and Finn

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I personally love this sunscreen! My skin is very sensitive and I burn very easily. To avoid “the greasy feeling” I make sure that I put it on first thing in the morning before going in the sun so that my skin San absorb the cream. Sprays on milky white so you don’t miss spots.
customer_reviews.author: JBLUECHIPS

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I'm allergic to zinc and some of the harsh chemicals in most sunscreen lotions. Clarins milk lotion does not aggravate my allergies, and moisturizes my skin. I spray it on in the morning and usually one application is all I need for the day. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping it would be more liquidy - It's not as thick as some, but it doesn't belong in a spray bottle - it's kinda hard to pump/spray it out. So, the search continues...
customer_reviews.author: maryannm

customer_reviews.title: Rich and protective
customer_reviews.text: A bit shiny and does require a bit of force to distribute evenly on skin but nourishes and protects.
customer_reviews.author: BrandNewReviews

customer_reviews.title: The best sunscreen I've ever had ever
customer_reviews.text: The best sunscreen I've ever had ever. I keep buying it repeatedly at Amazon.. I suggest you apply ever 30 mins to 1 hour when out in the sun deck.
customer_reviews.author: Joe M

customer_reviews.title: the best
customer_reviews.text: We love this sunscreen. It goes on quickly and moisturizes. My daughter who is sunscreen sensitive to almost all sunscreens (even the baby sunscreens, the all natural, and dermatologist recommended) does great with this Clarins sunscreen.
customer_reviews.author: rmstar

product_meta.title: Clarins Sunscreen Care Milk-Lotion Spray Broad Spectrum SPF 50+, 5 Ounce
product_meta.description: Specially designed for sun-intolerant skin or those exposed to intense sun. Provides Multi-Cellular Protection to consolidate skin's natural defenses and shield from premature aging. Contains efficacious. internationally recognized UVA-UVB filters to block out sun rays. Blended with Phyto-Sunactyl 2 to shield epidermal cells from sun stress. To use: Apply to clean skin before sun exposure. Reapply regularly on dry skin every hour in intense sun and after swimming.
